Hi, I am Gregg Coppen

AI Consulting for Purpose-Driven Organizations in British Columbia

Practical, privacy-first, and open-source. I help nonprofits, educators, and consultants build sustainable AI systems they can trust and control. I offer AI strategy, education, and implementation services for teams that want to build smart, sustainable systems—without the high cost or risk of vendor lock-in. Whether you’re automating internal processes, planning new services, or building client-facing tools, I work with you to find the right mix of open-source technologies that align with your mission and resources.

Nonprofits

AI solutions for mission-driven teams looking to automate operations and amplify impact.

  • AI opportunity mapping (internal workflows, donor engagement, etc.)
  • Setup of cost-effective, privacy-first automation tools
  • Team training & ethical AI guidance

Ideal for nonprofits with small teams and big goals

Educational Institutions

Augmented intelligence for educators and operations teams.

  1. Classroom and remote learning support using AI
  2. Automation of back-office and administrative tasks
  3. Self-hosted solutions that protect data and student privacy

For forward-thinking schools and learning centers

Consultants & Agencies

Build and own the systems your clients need - with zero vendor dependence.

  • Planning & design of AI-powered agent workflows
  • Integration of open-source LLMs and self-hosted tools
  • Extend your service offerings with AI systems you fully control

For digital consultants, boutique agencies, and freelancers

My Services

AI Education & Training

Building Your AI Foundation

AI Fundamentals for Leadership Teams

Let's sit down together and explore how AI is reshaping your industry. I'll cut through the hype to identify concrete opportunities while addressing practical concerns about implementation, ethics, and privacy. These interactive sessions are tailored to your organization's specific context and challenges.

Find out more

Hands-on Team Training

Nothing builds confidence like doing. These immersive workshops get your team working directly with self-hosted AI tools, translating concepts into practical skills through real-world scenarios relevant to your organization. By the end, they'll see exactly how AI can make their daily work more efficient and effective.

Find out more

AI Open-Source Toolkit

For teams that prefer self-paced learning, this on-demand resource provides step-by-step tutorials on deploying chatbots, automating workflows, and generating actionable insights from your data. The monthly subscription gives your entire organization access to regularly updated resources and implementation templates.

Find out more
For agencies: These training programs provide the perfect foundation for adding AI consulting and implementation to your client service portfolio. Imagine offering these capabilities alongside your existing expertise!

AI Discovery & Strategy

Charting Your AI Journey

Custom AI Consultation

Sometimes you just need someone to think through challenges with you. These flexible consultation sessions provide on-demand expertise for specific questions or roadblocks you encounter along your AI journey.

Find out more

AI Strategy and Implementation Roadmap

Every successful journey needs a map. I'll help you develop a comprehensive plan that aligns AI initiatives with your organizational goals. I'll establish realistic timelines, budget parameters, and impact metrics while making thoughtful choices between open-source and proprietary solutions based on your specific needs.

Find out more

AI Readiness Assessment

Before diving in, let's take stock of where you stand. I'll evaluate your current technology infrastructure, data resources, and organizational processes to identify your most promising AI opportunities. This assessment provides the clarity needed to make informed decisions about your AI investments.

Find out more
For agencies: This strategic approach helps you position AI-driven automation as a premium service offering. Imagine helping your clients transform their operations through thoughtfully applied AI!

AI Infrastructure & Implementation

Bringing Your AI Vision to Life

AI-Enhanced Website and Search Experience

Help visitors find exactly what they need. By integrating natural language processing capabilities into your website, I can create an intuitive search experience that understands context and intent. This is particularly valuable for organizations with extensive knowledge bases or complex offerings.

Find out more

Intelligent Content Creation System

Free your team from repetitive writing tasks. From drafting routine communications to generating social media content, these systems help maintain consistent messaging while reducing the time spent on administrative writing tasks. Your team maintains editorial control while AI handles the heavy lifting.

Find out more

AI-Powered Workflow Automation

Eliminate routine busywork. I'll identify processes that consume valuable staff time—email management, data entry, basic customer interactions—and build intelligent systems to handle them automatically. This frees your team to focus on work that truly requires human creativity and judgment.

Find out more
For agencies: These implementation services create exciting opportunities to offer AI as a managed service or value-added solution for your clients. Imagine expanding your portfolio with cutting-edge capabilities!
